source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT MAX(TrxnDate) as Input_Table_Date from DBO.IfTable_input
SELECT MAX(TrxnDate) as Output_Table_Date from DBO.IfTable_output
SELECT MAX(TrxnDate) as Input_Table_Date from DBO.IfTable_input
SELECT MAX(TrxnDate) as Output_Table_Date from DBO.IfTable_output

SELECT NAME, ADDRESS, CITY, COUNTRY  FROM DBO.ADDRESS_COMMON
WHERE COUNTRY = 'INDIA'

SELECT * FROM DBO.ADDRESS_COMMON
WHERE COUNTRY NOT IN ('INDIA', 'USA')
